00053 void ConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00054   short command = -1;
00055 
00056   if (eventPtr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00057     ApplicationHandler *requestHandler = 0;
00058 
00059     //eventPtr->display()
00060 
00061     try {
00062       if (eventPtr->messageLen < sizeof(int16_t)) {
00063         std::string message = "Truncated Request";
00064         throw new ProtocolException(message);
00065       }
00066       memcpy(&command, eventPtr->message, sizeof(int16_t));
00067 
00068       // sanity check command code
00069       if (command < 0 || command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX) {
00070         std::string message = (std::string)"Invalid command (" + command + ")";
00071         throw ProtocolException(message);
00072       }
00073 
00074       switch (command) {
00075       case Protocol::COMMAND_OPEN:
00076         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerOpen(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00077         break;
00078       case Protocol::COMMAND_CREATE:
00079         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerCreate(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00080         break;
00081       case Protocol::COMMAND_CLOSE:
00082         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerClose(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00083         break;
00084       case Protocol::COMMAND_READ:
00085         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerRead(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00086         break;
00087       case Protocol::COMMAND_APPEND:
00088         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerAppend(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00089         break;
00090       case Protocol::COMMAND_SEEK:
00091         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerSeek(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00092         break;
00093       case Protocol::COMMAND_REMOVE:
00094         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerRemove(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00095         break;
00096       case Protocol::COMMAND_LENGTH:
00097         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerLength(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00098         break;
00099       case Protocol::COMMAND_PREAD:
00100         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerPread(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00101         break;
00102       case Protocol::COMMAND_MKDIRS:
00103         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerMkdirs(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00104         break;
00105       case Protocol::COMMAND_FLUSH:
00106         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerFlush(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00107         break;
00108       case Protocol::COMMAND_RMDIR:
00109         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerRmdir(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00110         break;
00111       case Protocol::COMMAND_READDIR:
00112         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerReaddir(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00113         break;
00114       case Protocol::COMMAND_EXISTS:
00115         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerExists(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00116         break;
00117       case Protocol::COMMAND_RENAME:
00118         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerRename(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00119         break;
00120       case Protocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00121         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00122         break;
00123       case Protocol::COMMAND_SHUTDOWN:
00124         {
00125           uint16_t flags = 0;
00126           ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, eventPtr);
00127           if (eventPtr->messageLen >= 4)
00128             memcpy(&flags, &eventPtr->message[2], 2);
00129           if ((flags & Protocol::SHUTDOWN_FLAG_IMMEDIATE) != 0)
00130             m_app_queue_ptr->shutdown();
00131           m_broker_ptr->shutdown(&cb);
00132           exit(0);
00133         }
00134         break;
00135       default:
00136         std::string message = (string)"Command code " + command + " not implemented";
00137         throw ProtocolException(message);
00138       }
00139       m_app_queue_ptr->add( requestHandler );
00140     }
00141     catch (ProtocolException &e) {
00142       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, eventPtr);
00143       std::string errMsg = e.what();
00144       HT_ERRORF("Protocol error '%s'", e.what());
00145       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errMsg);
00146     }
00147   }
00148   else if (eventPtr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00149     HT_INFOF("%s : Closing all open handles from %s:%d", eventPtr->toString().c_str(),
00150                 inet_ntoa(eventPtr->addr.sin_addr), ntohs(eventPtr->addr.sin_port));
00151     OpenFileMap &ofMap = m_broker_ptr->get_open_file_map();
00152     ofMap.remove_all(eventPtr->addr);
00153   }
00154   else {
00155     HT_INFOF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00156   }
00157 
00158 }
